title: Apollo Considers Offer for Publisher Pearson
sub_head: Apollo has until April 8 to either announce a firm intention to make an offer or walk away
body:
Apollo Global Management Inc. is evaluating a possible cash offer for textbook publisher Pearson PLC, it said Friday.
Pearson had a market capitalization of 4.92 billion pounds, equivalent to $6.44 billion, as of Thursdayâ€™s close. Shares in the FTSE 100-listed company jumped 20% on Friday after Apollo said it was weighing an offer.
